headline.main: Role Playing: A Judge Is a Con, A Con Is a Judge; A judge is a con, a con is a judge

docs.abstract: R Hammer article Role Playing: A Judge is a Con, A Con is a Judge describes June workshop on crime and correction at St John's Coll, Annapolis, attended by judges, penologists, police officials and prisoners from Md prisons; details judges visit to Md prisons and their enactment of prison roles; summarizes conclusions of workshop participants, reactions; illus
